doc.field: Oper shr 16 cts vs three cts Oper net 1,930,000 vs 391,000 Revs 313.9 mln vs 308.9 mln Avg shrs 11.9 mln vs 12.0 mln Year Oper shr 60 cts vs 27 cts Oper net 7,215,000 vs 3,340,000 Revs 1.23 billion vs 1.16 billion Avg shrs 11.9 mln vs 12.0 mln NOTE: Prior year net excludes gains 4,896,000 dlrs in quarter and 8,873,000 dlrs in year from termination of overfunded pension plans.
